actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution impeaching Jonathan Goldstein U.S. attorney for the District of New Jersey, and Bruce Goldstein, principal assistant U.S. attorney for the District of New Jersey, for high crimes and misdemeanors within the meaning of article II, section 4, of the Constitution of the United States.

summary.text: States that Jonathan Goldstein, United States attorney for the District of New Jersey, and Bruce Goldstein, principal assistant United States attorney for the District of New Jersey, ought to be and are hereby impeached by the House of Representatives for high crimes and misdemeanors.

titles.title: Resolution impeaching Jonathan Goldstein U.S. attorney for the District of New Jersey, and Bruce Goldstein, principal assistant U.S. attorney for the District of New Jersey, for high crimes and misdemeanors within the meaning of article II, section 4, of the Constitution of the United States.
